description: Configure the welcomer system.

Configure the welcomer system.

## Usage

```sh
/welcomer setup
/welcomer preview
/welcomer update channel
/welcomer update message
/welcomer disable
```

## Subcommands

### setup

Setup the welcomer system.

#### Options

|    Name   |                 Description                 | Required |
| :-------: | :-----------------------------------------: | :------: |
| `message` | The message to use for welcoming new users. |    Yes   |
| `channel` |  The channel to use as the welcome channel. |    No    |

### preview

Preview your welcome message.

### update

#### channel

Update the welcome channel.

##### Options

|    Name   |        Description       | Required |
| :-------: | :----------------------: | :------: |
| `channel` | The new welcome channel. |    Yes   |
,
#### message

Update the welcome message.

##### Options

|    Name   |        Description       | Required |
| :-------: | :----------------------: | :------: |
| `message` | The new welcome message. |    Yes   |


### disable

Disable the welcomer system.

## Required Permissions

:::note
Learn more about permissions in [Discord's FAQ](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206029707-Setting-Up-Permissions-FAQ).
:::

- Manage Server
